Title: Penguin One, Us Zero
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Kath Lingenfelter
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: Kevin goes to see a therapist, after he has some unsettling encounters. Meg makes a decision about her future. Tom and Christine are left in a dicey situation. Jill and Aimee are interested as to where Nora is.
